title: Reach of fashion blog websites in Great Britain as of August 2013 , by age and gender
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Share of respondents in each Sex on the y axis.
Sex Under 35 has the highest Share of respondents and Male has the lowest Share of respondents.
Sex Male has 3.5 times less Share of respondents than Sex Under 35 which is the highest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Share of respondents in each Sex on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 7.0 is found at Sex Under 35 and the minimum is found at Male where Sex is 2.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Share of respondents in each Sex on the y axis.
Sex Under 35 has the highest Share of respondents and Male has the lowest Share of respondents.
Sex Male has 3.5 times less Share of respondents than Sex Under 35 which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Sex Under 35 and lowest at Sex Male.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Sex Female.
The lowest value at Sex Male is 3.5x times less than the highest value at Under 35.
Sex Under 35 is higher than any other Sexs with value 7.0, followed by Female, and 35 to 49. Down to Sex Male with the lowest value 2.0.
Sex Male, and 50 to 64 have the same Share of respondents.
The lowest value 2.0 at Male is almost 1.75 times smaller than the average value 4.0.
